availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Misdemeanor court presided over by the police judge of Versailles, Kentucky, with jurisdiction within the limits of the city. Judge(s): Preston B. Morrow (1861), David Pliney Robb (1861), Hezekiah H. Culbertson (1863).

ab.bibl:
"An Act to amend and reduce into one the several acts concerning the town of Versailles," Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Frankfort, Ky.: John M. Harney, State Printer, 1868), 273, 279-282.
KYR-0001-017-0151.
